attributes.action: Stop the privatisation or giving away of any British Asset.
attributes.additional_details: Hansards will give all relevant info or ask your MP.
attributes.background: This Government wants to give away acres of our Land free of charge to School Academy's with no clause as to its future sales. The Land Registry is a self funding cash raising institution putting over £100,000 pa back into our economy.  Academy sold land and raised £21,000,000. Nothing back to us.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/125804
